thread.title: Watch: Jung Joon Young Releases Emotional MV For “Me And You” Off New Full Album
thread.title_full: Watch: Jung Joon Young Releases Emotional MV For “Me And You” Off New Full Album

author: ilmare42
title: Watch: Jung Joon Young Releases Emotional MV For “Me And You” Off New Full Album
text:
Jung Joon Young has now released his first solo album “The First Person”! 
The singer’s new album hit online sites on February 7 at midnight KST, and the music video for his title track “Me And You” was also shared at that time. This track is a beautiful duet with singer Jang Hye Jin, and the music video features a couple’s happiest moments together and their post-split heartbreak, as well as clips of Jung Joon Young singing passionately. 
Watch the video below! 
Jung Joon Young also previously released a video for his album’s outro track “Echo” prior to the release of “The First Person.” 
What do you think of Jung Joon Young’s new title track?
